name: My Brother
description:
It is a funny puzzle platformer game about switching between the players to finish the level, it is so hard and so fun at the same time..

How To Play:

1- use the "1" and "2" keys to switch players

2- WASD to move around the level and space to jump

3- The camera will follow the selected player

4- The blue colors work with the blue player and the red colors work with the red player

5- if you were stuck under the level press "R" to restart

6- Press "Q" to quit to the menu

7- Your objective is to reach the purple door (both of the players should stand on it)

7- and enjoy playing
